title.rendered: 3PL and Joe Audio Partner to Provide Order Fulfilment Across the UK

content.rendered:
[vc_row type=”in_container” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” row_border_radius=”none” row_border_radius_applies=”bg” overlay_strength=”0.3″ gradient_direction=”left_to_right” shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none”][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none”][vc_column_text]3PL, the Wigan-based third-party logistics provider has announced an eCommerce order fulfilment partnership with Joe Audio, one of the UK’s fastest-growing audio-visual specialists.

Founded in 2011, Joe Audio stock an extensive range of state-of-the-art, audio-visual equipment for the record industry, which includes amplifiers, speakers, turntables, headphones and audio accessories, from a variety of exceptional brands. The business has grown to over 20,000 customers and due to increased demand needed to make the switch to a larger fulfilment centre.

3PL’s order fulfilment solution will streamline Joe Audio’s fulfilment by connecting to all major eCommerce carts and providing the ability to meet current and future market expectations across sales channels, eventually including Amazon SFP, supported by cloud-based technology Fusion and a scalable fulfilment warehouse that can be quickly reconfigured based on demand and business goals.

Dan Wood, Business Development Manager at 3PL, commented on the partnership “it is an absolute joy to be working with Mindy and her team, with such a great range of products. I know how proud they are of their successful family business, always striving for excellent service standards, with the customer genuinely at the forefront of all they do. We look forward to our partnership with Joe Audio, supporting their business growth plans and to underpinning the exceptional levels of service that their 20,000 customers have become accustomed to.”

“We are delighted and very grateful that we have discovered 3PL” Mindy Deutsch, Company Director at Joe Audio said “We have been on the hunt for a fulfilment solution company that will look after our business to the level we have been doing for the past 10 years.  Their expertise and professional advice and service is something we have not come across before and we look forward to taking our business to the next level with the help of 3PL.” 

 

About 3PL

Based in Wigan, 3PL offers multichannel eCommerce fulfilment and logistics for growing brands. As an end-to-end fulfilment solution, 3PL operates from over 250,000 sq. ft of shared user warehousing in the UK, supported by access to a network of international warehouses to support global expansion for its clients. Its fast-moving operations house over 16 million items of stock, and dispatch across some 32,000 product lines. Learn more by visiting 3p-logistics.co.uk

 

About Joe Audio

Founded in 2011, Joe Audio was first founded and directed by Efraim Deutsch who inspired the way to run the company with kindness fairness and care and also put humanity before business. A year later he gave the company over to Daughter-in-law Mindy Deutsch who has grown to business to over 20,000 loyal customers within the music industry. Learn more by visiting joeaudio.co.uk[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
